title.rendered: PNG vs Jersey, World Cup Qualifiers 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team on basis of probable XIs, recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

PNG: Tony Ura, Kiplin Doriga (wk), Sese Bau, Assad Vala (c), Hiri Hiri, Charles Amini, Chad Soper, Riley Hekure, Norman Vanua, Kabua Morea, Semo Kamea

Jersey: Harrison Carlyon, Nick Greenwood, Josh Lawrenson, Asa Tribe, Jonty Jenner, Dominic Blampied, Benjamin Ward, Julius Sumerauer, Jake Dunford (wk), Charles Perchard (c), Elliot Miles

Also Read:

Gujarat vs Chennai, Indian T20 League 2023 Fantasy Tips

Hyderabad vs Rajasthan, Indian T20 League 2023 Fantasy Tips

Bangalore vs Mumbai, Indian T20 League 2023 Fantasy Tips

Pitch Report

Venue: United Cricket Club Ground, Windhoek

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 299

2nd innings average score: 276

Wickets per innings: 8

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Since 2022, Asad Vala has not only scored the most runs (905 runs at 34) but also pouched the most catches (14) for PNG. More importantly, he made it to the Best11 in seven of the last 10 ODIs.

Semo Kamea has registered two five-fors in his last five ODIs. He has taken the most wickets (26) for PNG since his debut.

Nick Greenwood has been as effective in the field as he has been with the bat. He has a fifty and three catches to his name in the Qualifiers so far.

Jonty Jenner, the highest run-scorer for Jersey in T20Is, has translated his talent into performance in ODIs too. He top-scored with 76 in the last game against Namibia, registering his sixth 50-plus score in 17 List A matches.

Charles Amini’s only hundred of his career came at the venue. He took a mere 75 balls to hammer 109 runs, also giving bonus points for 16 boundaries. If anything, the conditions suit his brand of batting.

Josh Lawrenson has collected the most fantasy points for Jersey in the Qualifiers, also thanks to his recent form: 431 runs at an average of 48 in the last 10 games.

Since the start of WC Challenge 2022, Julius Sumerauer has sniped up 29 wickets in only 17 games at a terrific strike rate of 25.

Picking Chad Soper has rewarded fantasy players with plenty of points lately. In his last 10 outings, he took a three-for, four-for and five-for, and averaged 25 with the bat.

In the last three matches at the venue, pacers accounted for 30 of 50 wickets.
